Room.Name: East Ulandia
Room.ShortDescription: East Ulandia continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: A row of nice little shops are on the east side of the road, each appearing to be clean and neat. There's a wild-game butcher shop directly east, and next door to that is a tiny little restaurant with chairs and tables set out on the walk so that customers can enjoy the view of the river.
